mapper.insert: insert into ordertable (id, onum, uid, pay, paytype, status, addressid, postage, paytime, sendtime, closetime, endtime, createtime, updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update ordertable set onum = #{onum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay = #{pay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paytype = #{paytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addressid = #{addressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postage = #{postage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, paytime = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sendtime = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, closetime = #{closetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, onum, uid, pay, paytype, status, addressid, postage, paytime, sendtime, closetime, endtime, createtime, updatetime from ordertable where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
